captions.text:
The words I told you with 
difficulty good bye
Now left alone this night without you

I am still 
officially missing you
Like those nights I was waiting for you

The gaps between us 
that was long and dark
Hope this is not the end
I wanna go back

I changed all the things
That you wanted me to change
Where are you now

I am left alone lonely 
Today the wind blowing by feels colder
Why do you look so fine
You didn’t notice anything

but you should 
Just smile as you always did

Ooo can't nobody do it like you
Said every little thing you do

Hey baby say it
stays on my mind

And I
I'm officially missing you

You are the only one for me
I suffer because of you

I can’t forget you no 
matter how hard I try

It is so difficult to hate you
Too hard too hard
I am so sad that you don’t understand

I'm officially missing you 
officially missing you
yeah I'm officially missing you, too

I couldn’t say anything because 
The gaps between us is too long

And you are more meaningful 
than any other words

On another round, You are 
going far away and today passes away
It is left as a sad yesterday

You are still here after the nights 
My heart is still full of you

I can’t sleep and night 
and keep on suffering

Lights on the street shine me 
I empty my stomach in the toilet
I empty my stomach

I am still dizzy because of 
the left behind memories
Girl I still need somewhere to lean on
So I clean you out with this song

I still miss you habitually
The picture is smiling looking at me
If I put you in my eyes and smile

Would we able to do 
it again oh like that day

You are the only one for me
I suffer because of you
I can’t forget you no matter how hard I try

It is so difficult to hate you
Too hard too hard
I am so sad that you don’t understand

I'm officially missing you 
officially missing you
Can't nobody do it like you

Said every little thing you do
Hey baby say it
Stays on my mind

And I
I'm officially missing you
